description: Number of rooted nonseparable maps on the torus.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
T. R. S. Walsh, A. B. Lehman, Counting rooted maps by genus. III: Nonseparable maps. J. Combinatorial Theory Ser. B 18 (1975), 222-259.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
